name: Koiyohou
overview: Koiyohou is a first person adventure game that tells the story of 2 brothers Hisashi and his sister Maho and the game takes place in their school and there will be different situations that will change the feelings of the characters, and make that they can be better friends or fall in love with other characters of the game. They all will act in a threatrical acting that will takes place in the school and is about 2 childhood friends that one of them wants revenge against the other one for a bad situation that happened in the past. The game features japanese voice acting for the characters and different endings depending of the player choices during the game.
